gen:link.msg:message: WARNING: In table [670-73] S1001 should be equal to S0101+S0201+S0301+S0401+S0501+S0601+S0701+S0801 with margin of error [1] {{abs([670-73a:R10C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [670-73a:R1C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [670-73a:R2C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [670-73a:R3C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d}) + [670-73a:R4C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$e}) + [670-73a:R5C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$f}) + [670-73a:R6C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$g}) + [670-73a:R7C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$h}) + [670-73a:R8C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$i})) <= 1}}
